channel.title: Projects on Harish Kumar Sadasivam

item.description:
ðŸ“Š Projects #

AI-Enabled EMR System (Practicum Project) #

Technologies: MySQL, Node.js, React.js, Express.js, HTML, CSS, ICD-11

  • Led development of a dynamic Electronic Medical Records (EMR) platform integrating AI modules for clinical workflow optimization.
  • Built structured databases in MySQL, and connected them with interactive front-end forms for patient registration, search, and update using React.js and Node.js.
  • Enhanced search accuracy and user accessibility; enabled ICD-11-based documentation for standardization and interoperability.
  • Addressed key system challenges including plugin errors, password compatibility, and PID file issuesâ€”improving stability and usability of the EMR system.

Clinical Data Analysis of Hospital Readmissions and Patient Outcomes #

Technologies: Excel, SQL, Python (Pandas, Seaborn, Matplotlib), UCI Hospital Dataset
